column11: This is a beautiful location on the old racecourse ground with interesting architecture and a nice place to wander about around the grounds. The shopping mall is offering high end brands, to be fair I went on a Sunday afternoon and many of the outlets were closed so did not get a full view what was on offer. I think it is early days as everything seemed new - but worth a visit nice peaceful part of Colombo.

column8: Colonial racecourse building now shopping mall
column11: The old Colonial racecourse building in Colombo has been transformed into a shopping mall with some good international and local brands. Includes the flagship branch of Amante, the best local lingerie brand, with products on a par with international brands. There are a number of restaurants and coffee/tea shops too.
